wikipedia_page.main: Simon McCrory (born 1987 in Belfast, Northern Ireland) is an Irish sportsperson.  He plays hurling with his local club St. John's and has been a member of the Antrim senior inter-county hurling team since 2007.

response: *First goal of the championship: Simon McCrory for Antrim against Laois (Leinster preliminary round, 14 May 2011)
